title: FT/S: Bresnahan EPDG, Kleinow, Bos, SC460/25 +2 oversized
author: dougscats

posts.post_title: FT/S: Bresnahan EPDG, Kleinow, Bos, SC460/25 +2 oversized
posts.post_content:
This thread is being moved to The "New" Old Trading Post--

* These are last year's prices and may no longer be in effect.

Also, it may need some updating for traded/sold items.

[url]https://www.net54baseball.com/newreply.php?do=newreply&noquote=1&p=2060458[/url]

Orders under $100, add $3 S/H.

First come, first served. "I'll take it" trumps any other negotiations.

Email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] [Net54-generated emails sometimes wind up in my Junk mail, so email me directly from your home site] or post here. No pm's, please, unless necessary.

Ppff [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] or pay by check.  Regular paypal, buyer pays the fee.

BRESNAHAN, batting, EPDG, BVG 3.5, 
Clancy, Piedmont 350, SGC 30, [oversized] 
Dineen, Old Mill, SGC 20, [Intriguing card: oversized/miscut: measures 2 11/16" with slight diamond cut; half-name on bottom, blank top, which makes me wonder if this card was on the top line of an uncut sheet],
Kleinow catching, Bos,  SC 460/25, ~SP], SGC 50, (Is this considered a Short Print?  Technically excellent with a tough back, if you don’t mind the diamond-cut, this is a bargain).
MARQUARD, hands at sides, RC, EPDG, SGC 30 [very nice Good], $295, SOLD 
Quillen, Piedmont, SGC A [Looks Ex, presumably trimmed], 

Following are some other BST threads of mine with additional cards in different forums; you can combine any/all:

19th c. Woodcuts: [url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=283138[/url]

T202 Middle Panels: [url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=265602[/url]
1920's-50, H-o-F Odds and Ends: [url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=285669[/url]
1950-59: [url]https://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=287904[/url]

Also available:
IThe following cards are also available to combine with any of the above:

E91 Jacklitsch SGC 10--nice Poor

1914 Polo Grounds Game card, Frank Baker, SGC A [clipped corner; otherwise VG],

T220 Champions [Boxing]: Two of these have benn traded.  All four for $100--
Tommy Ryan, PSA 4,
Terry McGovern, PSA 4,
Jack O'Brien, PSA 4,
Jack McAuliffe, PSA 4,
Freddie Welsh, PSA 4.5,
Johnny Frayne, PSA 5

Topps:
1982 #21 Bonner/Ripken {RC], PSA 6,

Thomas,

Marquard is yours.
See payment info above 

I’m going out for a few hours.
Will send scans to the requests when I get back.

Thanks.

Can I see the Dineen?

Thanks, M
